other_title: アトム ザ・ビギニング (Japanese)
plot: In Japan after a great calamity, there were two geniuses who dreamed of the future. One was Umatarō Tenma. The other was Hiroshi Ochanomizu. The two labored day and night in robot research — Tenma to create a "god," and Ochanomizu to create a "friend." Thus a robot, A106, was born from their collaborative friendship. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Kaidoku Funō" (解読不能; Indecipherable) by After the Rain
ending_theme: "Hikari no Hajimari" (光のはじまり; The Beginning of the Light) by Yoshino Nanjō
